entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ScrollView always has a scroll bar on iOS #17224
  • Implement DependencyPropertyHelper.GetValueSource just like in WPF #17223
  • VisualDiagnostics.GetSourceInfo on Style object returns the wrong source location. #17222
    .NET 8 GA
  • blazor hybrid blazorwebview mixed mode http content and untrusted ssl certificate problem #17219
  • Mac/iOS: Clipping prevents from catching events in the background #17218
  • Mac Catalyst Binding Project does not work with MAUI without manual edit of project file #17217
  • Memory leak with GraphicsView in windows #17214
  • [MAUI] Recipe App build failed with error: One or more duplicate file names were detected #17213
  • [regression/8.0] Unable to access Implicit Styles #17212
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] - DataBinding not working inside ScrollView with nested elements #17211
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Binding IconImageSource on MenuFlyoutItem does not update on runtime. #17210
  • OpenAsync with OpenFileRequest opens share window on iphone #17209
  • [MAUI] The 'New Recipe' page will crash in landscape mode on iOS simulator #17208
    .NET 8 GA
  • Editor placed in Grid disappears when size changed #17206
  • SwipeView does not work correctly on iOS when opened programmatically #17204
  • TypeConverterAttribute bug with custom type converter #17203
  • Setting the `Style` property using triggers within a Style resource freezes the UI #17202

Closed

  • MaximumWidthRequest property behaves differently in Windows and Android #7366
    Backlog
  • The placeholder is displayed incorrectly on iOS and MacCatalyst #16916
    .NET 8 GA
  • Animated gifs are not working properly #7021
    Backlog
  • SwipeView open/close methods don't work as expected #16858

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable WinUI Controls Test Pipeline #17221
  • Add View docs #17220
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1] Update with internal flow #17216
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • [C] Port the specificity concept to Bindings #17215
    Under Consideration
  • Reinstate animated GIF on iOS & macOS #17207
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-image, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix templates for Linux builds #17205
    do-not-merge, area/templates 📄, Under Consideration

Updated

  • Fix OnPlatform + Setter when no match for current platform #17061
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Remove Debug and Release Entitlements plists and Replace with Custom Entitlements #16355
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, Under Consideration
  • Add ViewHandler & IViewHandler docs #17167
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Grid rows ios fix #17199
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, .NET 8 GA
  • Ensure that the navigation page renderer measures its current Page #17164
    area/navigation 🧭, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix CollectionView not displaying header or footers #16870
    area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #17104
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Under Consideration
  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Colors are not set #15668
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, .NET 8 GA
